title: Mad in Love  The Deep
lyrics:
Even in my darkest hour
Your love brightens up my night
And I just need a glimpse to see
You're never gonna leave my side
(One, two, one two three)



Because if your love's an ocean

I'm in the deep

I'm in the deep with you



I've got nothing to fear

'Cause you're here with me

Jesus you pull me through



I only wanna hold my breath

Stay in you forever

Totally committed to you



Because if your love's an ocean

I'm in the deep

I'm diving deep (yeah)

I'm in the deep with

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh



In the deep with

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

In the deep



Turned my sorrow into lasting joy

Forgiven now I've been made new

Devoted and I've made my choice

Well I don't want nobody else but you



'Cause if your love's an ocean

I'm in the deep

I'm in the deep with you



I've got nothing to fear

'Cause you're here with me

Jesus you pull me through



I only wanna hold my breath

Stay in you forever

I'm totally committed to you



Because if your love's an ocean

I'm in the deep

I'm diving deep (yeah)

I'm in the deep with

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh



I'm In the deep with

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

With you oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

I'm in the deep



'Cause if your love's an ocean

I'm in the deep

I'm in the deep



I'm in the deep with

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh



In the deep with

You oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

With you oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh



In the deep with

With you oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh



In the deep with
